title: _CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM (ntddchgr.h)
description: The CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM structure is used with the IOCTL_CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM request to exchange locations of two pieces of media.
